value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|Sorry I'm late. Did I miss anything?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Valentine18,Face|Perfect timing, Hector. Eliwood and I
are getting ready for the tournament.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|Just keep one thing in mind, Hector—
this is a festival. These weapons
are for show, not for war.$k$pThey're a bit delicate, so don't go
all-out.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Valentine18,Face|Delicate is right! Look at this gift box
I've got... Using weapons like these
makes the festival more fun, though.$k$pWhat have you got, Hector?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|Armads.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Valentine18,Face|You brought your battle-axe to the
festival?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|Sure I did. You said we'd be fighting
in a tournament. What did you expect
me to do?$k$pIn fact, I've got some questions for
you... Why are you using those
weapons? Do you even want to win?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Valentine18,Face|I'm starting to feel sorry for our
opponents...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Valentine18,Face|I take back what I said. I do not feel
sorry for our opponents. I hate to
admit it, but they did just fine.$k$pIf only I had Mulagir, or Sol Katti...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|Lyndis... Not you, too! Try to stay
calm, friends. And, for now, let's
withdraw.$k$p$Sbs150|
